body_html:
1. Add a maximum step number to terminate training normally.

  2. replace

    with tf.Session() as sess:

with the following code:

config = tf.ConfigProto()
config.gpu_options.allow_growth=True
sess = tf.Session(config=config)

with tf.Graph().as_default(),sess:
3. close the session after training
sess.close()
del sess
4. the version of my nvidia driver is 352.79 now.
I will update it to the latest version next week.

body:
1. Add a maximum step number to terminate training normally.
2. replace 
   
   with tf.Session() as sess:

with the following code:

  config = tf.ConfigProto()
  config.gpu_options.allow_growth=True
  sess = tf.Session(config=config)

  with tf.Graph().as_default(),sess:
3. close the session after training
    sess.close()
  del sess
4. the version of my nvidia driver is 352.79 now.
  I will update it to the latest version next week.
